did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Audio Recordings, Memorabilia, Photographs, Printed Materials.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Notebooks, photographs, documents, audio and video recordings, clothing and other artifacts by or relating to Grandmaster Caz and his career as a MC, songwriter, and DJ and his activities as an early innovator and participant in Hip Hop culture. Notebooks contain his handwritten lyrics; cassette tapes contain recordings of his live performances with the Cold Crush Brothers, as well as his appearances on radio shows and other events; photograph albums document his performances and activities with friends & family; Also included are vinyl records and video tapes; a denim jacket with painting by TATS CRU, sneakers, hats, and an action figure of his likeness.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Curtis "Grandmaster Caz" Fisher (aka Casanova Fly), was a member of the early Bronx Hip Hop group The Cold Crush Brothers. He is widely regarded as one of Hip Hop's greatest emcees (rappers). He is currently active as a celebrated NYC Hip Hop landmark tour guide, DJ, and worldwide ambassador of Hip Hop culture.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Notebooks, photographs, documents, audio and video recordings, clothing and other artifacts by or relating to Grandmaster Caz and his career as a MC, songwriter, and DJ and his activities as an early innovator and participant in Hip Hop culture. Notebooks contain his handwritten lyrics; cassette tapes contain recordings of his live performances with the Cold Crush Brothers, as well as his appearances on radio shows and other events; photograph albums document his performances and activities with friends & family; Also included are vinyl records and video tapes; a denim jacket with painting by TATS CRU, sneakers, hats, and an action figure of his likeness.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Grandmaster Caz archive, #8109. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Primarily contains legal pads and spiral bound notebooks with lyrics and miscellaneous notes.
Containers lyrics, a script for Echo Park, and various ephemera.
Materials documenting Grandmaster Caz's ventures as an MC, label owner, and public persona.

processinfo.p: Files were originally housed in Grandmaster Caz /Jazz Child Records folder. Folder is included.

scopecontent.p: Calendar and day planner filled in with Caz's appointments.

accessrestrict.p: Restricted to the permission of the curator.

did.unittitle: The MC: Master of Ceremony to Mic Controller

scopecontent.p: Article written by Grandmaster Caz for the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum.

did.unittitle: Tape Lists, bios, resumes, CEO files
Coalition for the Empowerment of Hip Hops Old School (C.E.O.)

scopecontent.p: Contains Grandmaster Caz stickers, advertisements, and business cards.
Clippings previously framed in Caz's apartment.
Includes performance, appearance, recording, and distribution contracts

did.unittitle: Echo Park: The Hip Hop Musical
Cold Crush non-disclosure agreement and bio

scopecontent.p: Contains VIP passes and ticket stubs
Programs, promotional materials, invitations, certificates, and ephemera for award ceremonies honoring Grandmaster Caz and/or other hip hop pioneers

did.unittitle: Hip Hop Hall of Fame and Museum
Rock and Roll Hall of Fame exhibit

processinfo.p: Arranged chronologically. Undated materials arranged alphabetically by title.

did.unittitle: Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture

scopecontent.p: Contains advertisements, stickers, and other promotional materials for various hip hop artists and brands
Includes treatments for "Wild Child La Rock" and "Mad Monkey Rock"
Includes autographs from various artists including Kurtis Blow, RZA, and Body Count
Contains 6 baseball caps, stored in hat box.
1 pair of Jordan Spizike sneakers worn by Caz.

processinfo.p: Arranged chronologically. Undated materials arranged alphabetically by title.

accessrestrict.p: Due to the fragility and potential degradation of moving image and sound recordings, viewing and listening is limited to items that have been digitized. If an item is in another media format, you may request to have the item digitized for access. Information on ordering access copies may be found on the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections webpage.
